entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Ivujivik
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:03 PM EST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -33.1°C
entry.summary:

Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 37.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending overnight then partly cloudy. Local blowing snow early this evening. Wind southwest 30 km/h. Low minus 37. Wind chill minus 47 this evening and minus 52 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 17 February 2023
